fields.title: Money Manager
fields.description:
The Money Manager app simplifies finance management through an intuitive Python-based application. It offers a user-friendly interface and robust features for handling transactions, tracking loans, and maintaining a transaction history.

Based on: Windows Only
User Interface (UI) Libraries: Tkinter, Customtkinter, tkcalendar
Data Handling Libraries: time, datetime, math, timedelta, calendar, os, openpyxl, configparser
Feartures: (LoanTransaction , Income/Expences Transaction) Management

fields.title: Photo Editor
fields.description:
Created an advanced photo editor using Python and OpenCV, featuring multiple filters, cropping, and image enhancement capabilities. This project demonstrates my proficiency in image processing and creating user-friendly interfaces for complex operations.

Based on: Windows Only
Technologies: Python, OpenCV, Tkinter
Features: Color up, Filter, Corp, Remove BG, Draw etc....

fields.title: MCQCHAMPS
fields.description:
Developed an interactive Multiple Choice Questions (MCQ) platform that allows users to test their knowledge on various subjects with real-time feedback.

MCQ: Study, take test
Technologies: Django, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Tailwind
With: PPT post, post your presentation
Goal: Make my Friends more knowledgeable

fields.title: (BIM & Apple) Calculator
fields.description:
Learning Based Calculator -> BIM Calculator, Apple Based Calculator. Created using Tkinter, Python, To get knowledge on UI design.

Based on: Windows Only
Technologies: Tkinter, Python

fields.title: Hackathon Winning: Pariwar
fields.description:
Pariwar is a web application designed to facilitate communication and support within families and extended family networks. It provides a platform where individuals, especially students who may find it challenging to communicate directly with their parents, can seek advice and support from other family members or individuals playing familial roles.

Group Project: Incodeable
Won: Incodeble IICQuest Hackathon
Technologies: Django, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node js.......

fields.title: Quiz Game: In C
fields.description:
The Quiz Game is a simple command-line program written in C. It allows users to play a quiz game, login/signup to their account, and for administrators to manage quiz questions. Users can play the quiz, view their scores, and administrators can add/remove quiz questions.

Based on: Command Line
Quiz: Play, (log/sign)-in, add, remove, check score, store in file....
Storing: In byte 2 files, one for `user` another for `Quiz`

Features: User Authentication, Quiz Game, Admin Panel, Help Page, Score Tracking

fields.title: Ko Bancha Karod Pati
fields.description:
"Ko Bancha Karod Pati" is a Nepali version of the popular game show "Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?". Developed using the Tkinter library in Python, it features multiple-choice questions covering various topics related to Nepal. Users can log in using customizable usernames and passwords, dynamically answer questions, and win money based on correct responses.

Based on: Windows Based, Tkinter GUI used
Features: Dynamic MCQs, Login System, Real-Time Feedback, Accumulated Earnings Display, End-of-Game Summary
Goal: Learning Tkinter for GUI based GUi creations.
